publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4816 Bob Doris: Disappointment at Diageo Decision—That the Parliament expresses disappointment at the announcement that Diageo has rejected Scottish Government task force proposals to save jobs at Port Dundas and Kilmarnock; praises the campaign efforts of workers, unions and politicians of all parties; considers that where jobs are at risk it is appropriate that the Parliament unites across party divides to steer corporate decision making in the direction that protects the Scottish national interest, and looks forward, despite the bad news, to the continuation of political unity as we strive to get the best deal from Diageo for redundant workers and to ensure the best support for retraining and the provision of employment services.

S3M-4816 Disappointment at Diageo Decision (lodged on 9 September 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Christina McKelvie*, Kenneth Gibson*, Sandra White*, Nigel Don*, Alasdair Allan*, Willie Coffey*, Gil Paterson*, Robin Harper*, Anne McLaughlin*, Stuart McMillan*

S3M-4816 Bob Doris: Disappointment at Diageo Decision—That the Parliament expresses disappointment at the announcement that Diageo has rejected Scottish Government task force proposals to save jobs at Port Dundas and Kilmarnock; praises the campaign efforts of workers, unions and politicians of all parties; considers that, where jobs are at risk, it is appropriate that the Parliament unites across party divides to steer corporate decision making in the direction that protects the Scottish national interest, and looks forward, despite the bad news, to the continuation of political unity as we strive to get the best deal from Diageo for redundant workers and to ensure the best support for retraining and the provision of employment services. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Christina McKelvie, Kenneth Gibson, Sandra White, Nigel Don, Alasdair Allan, Willie Coffey, Gil Paterson, Robin Harper, Anne McLaughlin, Stuart McMillan, Dave Thompson*, Angela Constance*, Michael Matheson*, Aileen Campbell*, Ross Finnie*
S3M-4816 Disappointment at Diageo Decision (lodged on 9 September 2009) Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Christine Grahame*
S3M-4816 Disappointment at Diageo Decision (lodged on 9 September 2009) Linda Fabiani*
